Document:
# Major Contraband Chemicals
## Intro These chemicals fall under major contraband unless otherwise stated by standard operating procedures.
Some major illegal chems may be utilized with a permit written by Head of Security or Warden. Some will also require a script written by the Chief Medical Officer.
When able, illegal component chemicalss are to be kept in ChemMaster 4000 or disposed of.
## Chemicals
### Amatoxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Bungotoxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Buzzochloric bees - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Chloral hydrate - Department exceptions: [bold]Medical[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Chlorine trifluoride - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### desoxyephedrine - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed & required[/bold][/color]
### Ferrochromic acid - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Fluorosulfuric acid - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Fresium - Department exceptions: [bold]Medical[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed & required[/bold][/color]
### Heartbreaker toxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed & required[/bold][/color]
### Licoxide - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Lipolicide - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Mechanotoxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Napalm - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Norepinephric acid - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Pax - Department exceptions: [bold]Security[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed & required[/bold][/color]
### Pest killer - Department exceptions: [bold]Botany[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed & required[/bold][/color]
### Phlogiston - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Plant-B-gone - Department exceptions: [bold]Botany[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed & required[/bold][/color]
### Polytrinic acid - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Razorium - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Not required[/bold][/color] - Permit: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
